name: Kill_Bronze

name: Kill_Silver
description: Destroy 50 other units with one unit.

name: Kill_Gold
description: Destroy 100 other units with one unit.

description: Move to 100 different tiles with one unit.

name: Globetrotter_Silver
description: Move to 500 different tiles with one unit.

name: GetHero
description: Getting your first hero.

name: LoseHero
description: Getting your first killed hero.

name: InvadePoland
description: Successfully finish the German invasion of Poland.

name: InvadeFrance
description: Successfully finish the German invasion of France.

name: MapEditor
description: Create and save your first map in the editor.

name: Globetrotter_Gold
description: Move to 1000 different tiles with one unit.

name: Airborne

name: Wolfpack
description: Sink your first ship using a submarine.

name: Shore bombardment
description: Destroy and enemy ground unit with a battleship.

description: You launched the game for the first time.

name: MotorizeIt
description: Motorize a unit for the first time.

name: MechanizeIt

name: HorseIt
description: Tow artillery or Anti-Air weapon with horses for the first time.

name: SicilyLanding

name: TakeKiev

name: Torpedo
description: Equip a plane with a torpedo.

name: Flamethrower
description: Buy a unit that has a flamethrower.

name: AttritionWar
description: Bring the fuel stock or the ammo number of the enemy to 0

description: Create your first unit from scratch

name: Cheater
description: Modify the stats of the base unit of the game

name: Surrender
description: Make an enemy unit surrender

name: Retreat
description: Make an enemy unit retreat

name: Upload mod
description: Upload your first mod to the workshop

name: Subscribe mod
description: Subscribe to at least 1 item in the workshop

name: Regicide
description: Kill an enemy general

name: Desperate war
description: Buy a volkssturm unit

name: Pacific Axis

description: Win the Afrikakorps as the Axis on the huge map of North Africa.

name: NATO
description: Toggle the NATO counters

name: Operation Citadel Allies
description: Win the Operation Citadel scenario on the Eastern front as the Soviets,

description: Invite another country to join your faction using the diplomacy panel.

description: Send any amount of money to any other player using the diplomacy panel.

description: Own 10 radars.
